title: Searching high Diamond ranked team who wants to play in ESl And co.
body:
Hey Guys, My name is Chris im 15 Years old right now. Im playing in the High diamond elo Between Diamond 1 and 4 im a main supp/mid. My Champion pool on support is at most:Thresh,Alistar,Lulu,Braum but im able to play and learn every champ on a pretty good Perfomance. My mid Champion pool is more based at ad Champs:Corki,Lucian, Syndra,Orianna 
Im able to sepak an good eng but my main speak is german 
 
If you are interested just contact me in the Client or here on this article

replies.body: jo not post this in german tread?
